com.helger.schematron.xslt

Class SCHTransformerCustomizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.helger.schematron.xslt.SCHTransformerCustomizer

  • public class SCHTransformerCustomizer
extends Object
    A wrapper for easier customization of the SCH to XSLT transformation.
    Author:
    Philip Helger
